archimate:Requirement.name: ensure that core principles behind “zero trust” thinking is utilized
archimate:Requirement.documentation: environment; simply relying on known detections is likely not enough (re: last years COS incident), with clearly identified, skilled and tasked resources doing ongoing threat hunting in this environment, including building, acquiring and extending necessary tooling to do so effectively and efficiently. This is to ensure that core principles behind zero trust thinking is utilized across the whole of TEMA environment.
